name: RETRIEVE_INFORMATION
description: Extracts information from a given set of documents or databases based on query criteria.

properties.name: query
properties.description: The search query or criteria used to retrieve information.

properties.name: databases
properties.description: A list of database names or identifiers to be searched.

properties.name: include_metadata
properties.description: A boolean indicating whether to include metadata in the search results.

name: LEGAL_DOCUMENT_ANALYSIS
description: Analyzes legal documents to extract key information, clauses, and to identify potential legal issues.

properties.name: document_text
properties.description: The full text of the legal document to be analyzed.

properties.name: analysis_type
properties.description: The type of analysis to perform, such as 'clause_extraction', 'issue_identification', or 'summary'.

name: DATABASE_QUERY_EXECUTION
description: Executes a query on a database and retrieves the resulting data.

properties.name: query
properties.description: The SQL query to be executed on the database.

properties.name: database_credentials
properties.description: The credentials required to access the database, including host, user, and password.

name: LIST_MANAGEMENT
description: Performs operations on lists such as adding, removing, or retrieving elements.

properties.name: list
properties.description: The list on which to perform the management operations.

properties.name: operation
properties.description: The operation to perform on the list, such as 'add', 'remove', or 'get'.

properties.name: element
properties.description: The element to be added or removed from the list, if applicable.

name: DATA_FILTERING
description: Filters a dataset based on specified criteria to retrieve a subset of data.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The array of data elements to be filtered.

properties.name: filter_criteria
properties.description: The criteria used to filter the data, which can include various fields and conditions.

name: PERFORM_MARKET_RESEARCH
description: Conducts comprehensive market research to gather insights and data on specific market segments.

properties.name: industry
properties.description: The industry or market segment to focus the research on.

properties.name: keywords
properties.description: A list of keywords relevant to the research.

properties.name: region
properties.description: The geographic region for which the market research is to be conducted.

name: RETRIEVE_ECONOMIC_DATA
description: Fetches economic statistics and data such as GDP, inflation rates, and employment figures from various sources.

properties.name: countries
properties.description: An array of country names or codes to retrieve economic data for.

properties.name: indicators
properties.description: A list of economic indicators to retrieve data for, such as 'GDP', 'CPI', or 'unemployment_rate'.

properties.name: time_frame
properties.description: The time frame for the economic data, such as 'quarterly' or 'yearly'.

name: GENERATE_BOOK_LISTS
description: Curates lists of books based on specified criteria such as genre, author, or popularity.

properties.name: genres
properties.description: An array of genres to include in the book list.

properties.name: authors
properties.description: A list of authors to filter the book list by.

properties.name: popularity
properties.description: A boolean to determine if the list should be sorted by popularity.

name: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_ANALYSIS
description: Analyzes energy consumption data to provide insights into usage patterns and efficiency opportunities.

properties.name: source
properties.description: The energy source to analyze, such as 'electricity', 'gas', or 'renewable'.

properties.name: region
properties.description: The geographic region for which the energy consumption data is to be analyzed.

properties.name: sector
properties.description: The sector of energy consumption, such as 'residential', 'commercial', or 'industrial'.
